alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Broward County through 500 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Weston, or 7 miles northwest of Pembroke Pines, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Weston, Cooper City, Sunshine Acres, Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road and Markham Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County
